term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - saturation vapour pressure
term.title: saturation vapour pressure

item.text: The pressure exerted by a pure substance (at a given temperature) in a system containing only the vapour and condensed phase (liquid or solid) of the substance.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2212 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
